hanzi-su-wiki:
衛

Значения

Защищать, предотвращать

Мнемоника

Носилки императора из прочной кожи 韋 носорога, находящиеся между рядами 行 охраны, его надежная защита.

Варианты

衞, 卫

to guard; to protect; to defend; abbr. for 卫生 , hygiene; health; abbr. for 卫生间 , toilet
охранять; защищать; защищать; сокр. для гигиены, гигиены; здоровье; сокр. для туалета, туалета

heisig_chinese_memo: For "defending against the dark arts" class, you go to the magical boulevard and buy an enchanted locket.
heisig_constituent: defence, boulevard, going, locket, stick, key, mouth, monocle, sunglasses with one lens missing
heisig_story: Boulevard . . . locket. Do not confuse with ward off (Frame 1399), protect (Frame 1072), guard (Frame 198), or safeguard (Frame 756).
koohiiStory1: [defense; protection] For "defense against the dark arts" class, you go the magical boulevard and buy an enchanted locket.
koohiiStory2: Since it was in the middle of the boulevard, everyone could see she hit the man only in self-defense, as he was trying to steal her valuable locket.
jp_example_words:
衛生(えいせい): health, hygiene, sanitation, medical
護衛(ごえい): guard, convoy, escort
守衛(しゅえい): security guard, doorkeeper
防衛(ぼうえい): defense, protection, self-defense
衛星(えいせい): satellite
自衛(じえい): self-defense
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to go to Korea you'll need a good defense.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Things in Korea haven't been on the safest side lately, so make sure you have some ways to defend yourself before you go.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need a good defense to go to Korea, so you fill your pockets with acorns (えい). When you get to Korea you plant them all around yourself. In no time you'll have a strong tree defense, keeping you safe.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Okay, so maybe this defense strategy will take a while, but you aren't rich and acorns are on the ground for free. Don't judge!
Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 彳 (шаг), 行 (идти), 韋 (дублёная кожа)

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the tanned leather (韋) goes (行) to your defense
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The ninja sits on the floor ready to defend in the dark, patiently waiting to chop up his enemy upon entry.
humanum_full_description_en:
The word " Wei " in the oracle bone inscriptions starts from " Xing " and " Zhi " from "囗", and " Zhi " is the original text of toe, from the meaning of " Zhi " to Gongwei city. The original meaning is guard (Xu Zhongshu). Or not from "囗" but from " fang ", "囗" is like a city, and "囗" also means square, so it can be used in common with " fang ". Said from a " party of" defensive shape of " anti " word (Guo, Qiu Xigui).

Imports only around two in the shape of that is, " Wei " word, " Wei " is " health " of sound character. The inscription " square " may be changed to "帀". See " Wei ".

The oracle bone inscriptions represent defense and are also used as sacrificial names, place names, and personal names. Jin Wen means to defend, and Ban Gui: "Father Wei, Jingdong or (country) for three years." It is also used as a name for people and places. Xian Gui: "Gong Diao (uncle) first saw Yu Wei", Qiu Weizhen: "Ju Bai (Bo) generalist took Jin (Jin) chapter (Zhang) from Qiu Wei."

" Wei " in Chinese as the " Guardian ", "Orthography Tong": "Wei, Wei vulgar word," "said the text": "Wei, Wei Su Wei also from Za, from row row, column Wei also..."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle " Wei " word from the " line " from the second " stop " from " imports ", " stop " is the beginning of the text toe from twenty " stop surround and protect the cities of meaning" elephant, the original meaning is guarded (Xu Shu).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文「衛」字從「行」從二「止」從「囗」，「止」是趾的初文，從二「止」象拱衛城邑之意，本義是守衛(徐中舒)。或不從「囗」而從「方」，「囗」象城邑形，「囗」又表示方形，故可與「方」通用。一說從「方」的字形是防衛的「防」字(郭沫若、裘錫圭)。

　　二止繞囗之形即「韋」字，「韋」是「衛」的聲符。金文「方」形或改為「帀」。參見「韋」。

　　甲骨文表示防衛，又用為祭名、地名、人名等。金文表示保衛，班簋：「衛父身，三年靜東或(國)。」又用作人名、地名。賢簋：「公弔(叔)初見于衛」，裘衛盉：「矩白(伯)庶人取堇(瑾)章(璋)于裘衛。」

　　「衛」的異體作「衞」，《正字通》：「衛，俗衞字。」《說文》：「衞，宿衞也。从韋帀，从行。行，列衞也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文「衛」字從「行」從二「止」從「囗」，「止」是趾的初文，從二「止」象拱衛城邑之意，本義是守衛(徐中舒)。

甲骨文「 衛 」字從「 行 」從二「 止 」從「 囗 」，「 止 」是趾的初文，從二「 止 」象拱衛城邑之意，本義是守衛(徐中舒)。或不從「 囗 」而從「 方 」，「 囗 」象城邑形，「 囗 」又表示方形，故可與「 方 」通用。一說從「 方 」的字形是防衛的「 防 」字(郭沫若、裘錫圭)。 二止繞囗之形即「 韋 」字，「 韋 」是「 衛 」的聲符。金文「 方 」形或改為「 帀 」。參見「 韋 」。 甲骨文表示防衛，又用為祭名、地名、人名等。金文表示保衛，班簋：「衛父身，三年靜東或(國)。」又用作人名、地名。賢簋：「公弔(叔)初見于衛」，裘衛盉：「矩白(伯)庶人取堇(瑾)章(璋)于裘衛。」 「 衛 」的異體作「 衞 」，《正字通》：「衛，俗衞字。」《說文》：「衞，宿衞也。从韋帀，从行。行，列衞也。」
The word " Wei" in the oracle bone inscriptions starts from " Xing" and " Zhi" from " 囗", and " Zhi" is the original text of toe, from the meaning of " Zhi" to Gongwei city. The original meaning is guard (Xu Zhongshu). Or not from " 囗" but from " fang", " 囗" is like a city, and " 囗" also means square, so it can be used in common with " fang". Said from a " party of" defensive shape of " anti" word (Guo, Qiu Xigui). Imports only around two in the shape of that is, " Wei" word, " Wei" is " health" of sound character. The inscription " square" may be changed to " 帀". See " Wei". The oracle bone inscriptions represent defense and are also used as sacrificial names, place names, and personal names. Jin Wen means to defend, and Ban Gui: "Father Wei, Jingdong or (country) for three years." It is also used as a name for people and places. Xian Gui: "Gong Diao (uncle) first saw Yu Wei", Qiu Weizhen: "Ju Bai (Bo) generalist took Jin (Jin) chapter (Zhang) from Qiu Wei." " Wei" in Chinese as the " Guardian", "Orthography Tong": "Wei, Wei vulgar word," "said the text": "Wei, Wei Su Wei also from Za, from row row, column Wei also..."

衛字的基本解释

衛
wèi
见“卫”。

衛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》于歲切，去祭，云。］
“卫1”的繁体字。亦作“衞1”。
(1)防守；卫护。
(2)引申为承侍。
(3)引申为掩盖。
(4)卫士；警卫。
(5)古代九服之一。亦指五服之一。
(6)箭旁的羽毛。
(7)锐利。
(8)肢体。指四肢。
(9)每个。
(10)中医学名词。卫气。
(11)引申为事物的外表。
(12)驴的别名。
(13)通“禕”。美好。
(14)通“璏”。玉制剑鼻。
(15)明代军队编制名。清初曾沿用。于要害地区设卫，大致以五千六百人为一卫，由都司率领，隶属于五军都督府。一般驻地在某地即称某卫，如威海卫、金山卫等，后相沿成为地名。
(16)清代户口编制名，以三千户为一卫。
(17)古国名。公元前十一世纪周公封周武王弟康叔于卫。先后建都于朝歌（今河南淇县）、楚丘（今河南滑县）、帝丘（今（河南濮阳）和野王（今河南沁阳）等地。公元前209年为秦所灭。
(18)水名。源出河北灵寿县东北，南流入滹沱河。
(19)旧时西藏四部之一。在诸藏之中

衛字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【行字部】　衛； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1109第29
【正字通】俗衞字。

衛字的起名意思

暂无。

guard
Basic explanation of words
guard
wèi
See "Wei".
guard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" cuts at every year, to sacrifice, cloud. ]
Traditional characters of "卫1". Also known as "Wei 1".
(1) Defense; guard.
(2) By extension, Chengshi.
(3) Extended to cover up.
(4) Guards; guards.
(5) One of the nine ancient clothes. Also refers to one of the five services.
(6) Feathers beside the arrow.
(7) Sharp.
(8) Limbs. Refers to the limbs.
(9) Each.
(10) Chinese medical terms. Wei Qi.
(11) Extended to the appearance of things.
(12) The alias of the donkey.
(13) Through "Yi". Beautiful.
(14) Through "Juan". Jade sword nose.
(15) The name of the army establishment in the Ming Dynasty. It was used in the early Qing Dynasty. Set up guards in key areas, roughly five thousand six hundred people as one guard, led by the Dusi, and under the Five Armies Dudu Mansion. Generally, the resident in a certain place is called a certain Wei, such as Weihaiwei, Jinshanwei, etc. The back phase edge becomes the place name.
(16) In the Qing Dynasty, the establishment of household registration names, with three thousand households as one guard.
(17) Ancient country name. In the eleventh century BC, Zhou Gong named Zhou Wu Wang's brother Kang Shu Yuwei. The capitals were successively established in Chaoge (now Qixian, Henan), Chuqiu (now Huaxian, Henan), Diqiu (now (Puyang, Henan) and Yewang (now Qinyang, Henan) and other places. It was destroyed by Qin in 209 BC .
(18) The name of the water. It originates from the northeast of Lingshou County, Hebei, and flows into the Hutuo River in the south.
(19) One of the four parts of Tibet in the old days. Among the Tibetans
guard

wèi
вм. 卫
Radicals: 行, 韋  (go, korea)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to go to Korea you'll need a good defense.
Things in Korea haven't been on the safest side lately, so make sure you have some ways to defend yourself before you go.
Reading Mnemonic
You need a good defense to go to Korea, so you fill your pockets with acorns (えい). When you get to Korea you plant them all around yourself. In no time you'll have a strong tree defense, keeping you safe.
Okay, so maybe this defense strategy will take a while, but you aren't rich and acorns are on the ground for free. Don't judge!
